description: Snap magnificent shots and discover the creatures' most impressive poses. Collect wildlife details and snapshots in your trusty park guidebook. Uncover the park's history, secrets & many hidden paths. Utilize your trusty Grappling Hand to interact with the environment. Enter the spooky realm by unlocking your camera's Ghost-o-vision.
name: Penko Park
intro: Snap pictures of spooky-cute creatures & explore an abandoned wildlife park.
